items.name: Tempest Vise
enchantMods: Trigger Commandment of Light when you take a Critical Strike
implicitMods: Attacks have 15% chance to Maim on Hit
+10% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
explicitMods: Adds 10 to 17 Cold Damage to Attacks
49% increased Attack and Cast Speed while Focused
craftedMods: +1 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 70 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3272 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 8 seconds if used while Bleeding

items.name: Wilma's Requital
enchantMods: Petrified Blood has 45% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
implicitMods: Socketed Skill Gems get a 90% Cost & Reservation Multiplier
explicitMods: 26% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

flavourText: Bold and beautiful, a castaway
Hemmed and hawed, for her to stay
Oh, what I'd give for one more day
For she's the one that got away
-Franklin

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 76% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fire arrows into the air that rain down around the targeted area, dealing damage to enemies they hit and creating spore pods where they land.
